content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The following training, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"“Usability Engineering Procedure version 5.0\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"” will help you to become familiar with or revise the instructions and directions of the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Usability Engineering Procedure along with its updates that were made during last revision. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please remember:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" According to the requirements of ISO 13485 standard, personnel performing work affecting product quality shall be competent on the basis of appropriate education, training, skills and experience. It takes each of us to follow EPAM’s regulations for the Quality Management System for Life Sciences and Healthcare. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To complete this brief training: \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.\\tFirst follow the link below and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"review the Usability Engineering Procedure\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"; \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.\\tAfter reviewing the procedure, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"please answer 3 short question\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"s;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.\\tWhen you are finished, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"click on the button at the bottom to confirm that you have read, understood, are in compliance, and will continue to comply with EPAM’s Usability Engineering Procedure. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Thank you for taking the time to pay attention to this very important topic. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To begin “Usability Engineering Procedure version 5.0”, click a \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Policy/Procedure%20Descriptions/Procedure%20Description%20Usability%20Engineering.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LINK\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to go to the ECL| EPAM Ethics and Compliance Library and read the procedure.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
